Reviews.Title: Not a good experience thus far
Reviews.Author: Francis P. Sullivan
Reviews.Content: Beautiful looking set, great picture. BUT - steady buzz from back of set.  Not very loud, but clearly shouldn't be there.  When sitting in front of the TV with it turned on, you really can't notice. But if you turn volume down, or mute, it is clearly noticable. Called customer service - and she was clearly someone with barebones training. Most questions I asked her, she put me on hold and obviously checked with someone else.  Anyway, bottom line is she came back to the phone and told me that 'that's normal; that's the way the set sounds'.  I voiced my concern about this answer, but clearly was not going to get any further on this phonecall. Hung up. To be sure I wasn't being too picky, I had my wife and a brother come into den, where this TV is, and they both agreed that this was, in fact, NOT normal - at all!  Called Samsung back, gave them history, and told the guy NOT to tell me this was 'normal'.  He didn't. Instead he dispatched local repair shop. Several days later service guy arrived, and took set apart.  He figured out which module was buzzing, and ordered one.  Two weeks later he returned with an entire front panel of the TV. This includes new screen, frame, most of the guts (including buzzing component), less one board, and power supply. Samsung told him to order it that way, not just the "failing" component (?)  Almost a new TV entirely! He put it all together, and guess what?  The noise was still there, but now louder than ever!  That was a few days ago, and here I sit with my now louder buzzing TV, that I can now hear, sitting in front of set with normal volume on.  And Samsung says this is Normal !!  Grrrrrrrrrr.  The service guy now plans on ordering a new power supply, and replacing that.  If that doesn't work, he thinks a new set entirely is in order!  Except for 1 board where all the jack connectors are, the metal back panel, and the pedestal, isn't that what I already have?? !  To be continued....

Reviews.Title: Nice TV when not buzzing
Reviews.Author: MadMike
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is very nice, set up is intuitive, and the styling is attractive.  The first TV had a loud buzzing sound emanating from the rear.  Other reviewers have noted this and it was noticeable at normal listening levels. Some times it was loud as soon as the set was turned on and other times it became louder over time.The second set hasn't had this problem yet.  A low buzzing sound is still present, but you cannot hear it while watching TV. There appears to be an issue with a component on this model since my older Samsung doesn't exhibit this problem.The price is right and the set is very nice, but you may have to exchange it due to the buzzing sound.

Reviews.Title: Amazon Warehouse Returns/Yay & Open Box Item/Nay
Reviews.Author: DBuck
Reviews.Content: I took a chance on an open box offer from Amazon Warehouse Deals...wont do that again!Pros: Great Price, Beautiful TV, Fantastic Picture, Easy return policy (Thumbs up Amazon!!!)Cons: BZZZzzzzzzzzzzZZZZZzzzzzzzzzzzzz...the noiZZZZe from the back of the TV was annoying! Back to the Amazon Warehouse buZZard!Dont be afraid to buy a SAMSUNG TV! I have 3 now and they are gorgeous TVs. Purchased NEW, but different model for a bit more $ but I am still very happy with the purchase.http://www.amazon.com/gp/offer-listing/B0036WT3KM/ref=dp_olp_new?ie=UTF8&condition;=newWord of Advice - make sure you have a good return policy in place if buying used, refurb or open items!

Reviews.Title: Buzzzzz!
Reviews.Author: Mak Sui
Reviews.Content: Right when you turn the set on, there's a loud buzzing sound which is noticeable from atleast 10 feet away. So I'd turn the volume up to around 20 and still noticeable (I have pretty good hearing). But the buzzing sound constantly comes and goes which is pretty annoying. Also if you switch the 'Energy Saving Mode' to anything besides off, the sound is constantly there. Overall, the tv has great picture and sound, but the buzzing sound ruins the tv experience.

Reviews.Title: Samsung model LN37C550  37" 1080p LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: S. Bell
Reviews.Content: grabbed 1 on sale this week to replacea very very old unit in the home.the entire viewing family is VERY pleasedwith this unit.1 - we don't have the high buzzing soundfrom ours that one person mentioned as adefective unit.2 - the dark colored front panel controlson the lower front bezel are a bit lightbut we mostly use the remote controls sothat isn't a real issue.unit fits our built in hardwood multimedia cabinetry perfectly  37" is theright choice for our smaller viewing area.i think the screen views well even fromextreme side seating locations.things i might suggest to the factory;1 - it seemed the set had minimal paddinginside when i opened the box. ours is, asi said, in perfect shape, but if i wasthe factory QC guy, i'd be putting moreprotection in front of the screen. oursused a 2 inch space for protection and thebox itself.2 - i'd try to put small recessed handlegrabs in the rear frame in a larger designelement like this. lifting it is a twoperson job per the manual but both peoplefound their grips slipping on the highlypolished (and good looking) set edges.our entire extended family seems to havesettled on the Samsung line. that'sabout 12 sets! really; we all love thisbrand, have many different styles andhave had great experiences with theperformance and reliability of the Samsungequipment.  we did get an extended warrantyanyway on an investment like this one.i haven't tried the connectivity to myhome network yet, but the menu seems welldesigned and very logical. my wife is becomingthe family set it up expert.i gave this 5 stars in the rating.very pleased.oh... i have a large surge suppressorUPS box on the infeed from the electricoutlet. we have them on ALL our electronicdevices, PC, etc. power in our area is veryprone to spikes and storm related events.i'd suggest this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: S. Stanbridge
Reviews.Content: I purchased this a few months ago and I'm very happy with my purchase. It was easy to program and I especially love the feature that allows me to control the maximum volume while changing stations or while the station goes from one commercial to the next. No more SCREAMING commercials!  Excellent picture quality, great sound, easy setup and the delivery company even carried it upstairs to my master bedroom and set it up there!

Reviews.Title: good tv for small rooms!
Reviews.Author: poporolo "poporolo"
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV for a week now and I am very pleased with it, it is a perfect fit for my small room, I love the picture in picture as I am right now writing this review comfortably from my bed using the TV as a monitor and watching my fav channel at the same time all in the same screen. I don't know if all those buzzing units were a defctive batch cause mine is completely quiet. the extra money is worth it for this 37 inch screen, good features, lots of ports to connect your devices and image quality is very good on Full HD movies. nice work SAMSUNG

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Jimmi
Reviews.Content: Nice TV. Great picture. I'm not really a super picture and sound snob, but I'd definitely say this is a great tv. The sound does get really loud. I'm at 15 out of 100 and it's already pretty loud. Really Nice. I like it.

Reviews.Title: Good TV best stand being solid glass not plastic
Reviews.Author: steeps
Reviews.Content: Good overall TV Color is good contrast brightness But will say ONE DRAWBACK is if  you view TV from a angle..it losses a lot of its intensity. It dont have a WIDE viewing angle for side viewing. Though you still see the picture...it has much less of its Contrast at a angle..bought for my parents and only reason TV was not the best choice for them was they view it mostly from  angle in thier chairs. but it does Swivel nicely if you do disire to sway it your way for the peak picture and very solid glass base. Again...If you are someone who has most of your viewing for this TV to be from a ANGLE when seated...best to chose those that advertise a WIDER optimum viewing degree angle..like those who say something like a 176 degree angle of viewing...My Vizio does have a better viewing angle not losing its peak picture quality nearly as quick as you angle your view.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: R. Crowe
Reviews.Content: The TV is nice.  It is the 3rd Samsung we have purchased.  The shipping carrier was troublesome, but eventually worked it all out.  There is a slight hum, but it is mounted up high in the kitchen and is pretty much unnoticable.  Some of the menu options on the remote are a little difficult to get to.  Especially when changing from TV to view a DVD or Blu-ray or something.  It would have been nice to have a one touch button for that.  Instead you have to scroll through the menu a little bit.  Can be slow to respond.This was the best price on the internet by about $75.  I paid $648 with no tax and no shipping.  Well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 37-inch LCD Televison
Reviews.Author: Kel M
Reviews.Content: We are very pleased with this television.  However, the instructions for hooking it up could have been clearer, especially for connecting it to a VHS/DVD recorder/player.  We keep it on a stand rather than mounting it on a wall.

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV / TERRIBLE SAMSUNG "NO SERVICE"
Reviews.Author: Lee
Reviews.Content: TV performs as good if not better than advertized.  I read the comments about the poor customer support from Samsung, and THEY WERE RIGHT.  I bought the LAN adapter so I could show pictures from my laptop on the TV and was having problems because the owners manual was confusing and it was not working.  When I called customer support I KNEW MORE THAN THEY DID AND I KNEW NOTHING!!  I was told that I had to have the TV connected to the Internet in order for it to work.  I said that I have a router.  The TV talks to the router.  The Laptop talks to the router.  Why do they have to go on line for the Laptop to talk to the TV????  I was told (in a condisending way)that is the way it works.  I called several times in hopes that I would finaly get someone that was at least shown the manual for this TV but that was never to happen.  I finally got it all to work properly.  Love the TV.  HATE THE "CUSTOMER NO SERVICE" at Samsung.  I'll think twice about buying Samsung products againg.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Picture
Reviews.Author: Waz
Reviews.Content: The picture and color quality are awesome.  We've had the t.v. for almost 2 months and have yet to find any complaints.  Very crisp and clear picture, vibrant colors.  The set-up and programming was almost too easy, it made you think you forgot to do something because of the ease.  Connecting to the internet was just as easy.  I would definitely buy this product again and would convince my friends to purchase it also.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN37C550 37-Inch 1080p 60 Hz LCD HDTV (Black)
Reviews.Author: Dave Matthews "DMBfan"
Reviews.Content: I received a buzzing set, not too happy about it. It is a brand new TV. I still haven't decided if I am going to return it. The quality is Samsung great, but I can't believe they never fixed this in the year this TV has been out. I am using the set for an exercise room, so the buzzing may not bother me now, and it isn't too bad, but at quiet moments in watching TV, I could see this bothering people.Samsung should have fixed this instead of trying to sell the remaining stock, I got a great price through Amazon, and it kills me to have to return it.Bad form Samsung, it is silly of you to let this problem make your reputation look bad, I am disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great TV sets.
Reviews.Author: G. Booth (California)
Reviews.Content: I just purchased 2 Samsung 550 37" LCD TVs from Amazon. Glad I did.Initially I was concerned about other reviewers of buzzing in the set. Obviously I did not want that to occur. However, I viewed the set at a local store and the sound was fine. Also, we have a larger Samsung and Sony in our other rooms. Of which are great sets.We wanted these smaller 37" TVs for a den and study room.When I ordered them, based on the other reviewer percentages, I thought there may be a 25% chance would need to return them.So, I ordered 1 at a time. Their prices have dropped a lot and with the free shipping, they were a bargin. They came in about 5 days from the order date.Both were perfect. Beautiful frame/set astetically, great picture and very good sound.Solid sets. Looks nicer than other Sony and Visio sets I saw.There is no buzzing on either set -even on Mute and with you ear right at the set.They were quick to set up and work fine.So, would recommend the set highly.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV works great
Reviews.Author: Kola
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with the TV. The only change I would make is that it takes about 5 secs to turn it on.  This makes you question whether the button was pushed so it gets pushed again.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: wineron
Reviews.Content: I am so glad that I listened to my son.The 37 inch TV fit s perfectly in the room and the quality of picture is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LCD 37"
Reviews.Author: Wiz
Reviews.Content: Product was very easy to set up and has an excellent picture. We are in a fringe area and still use an antenna. The design and features on this TV has met all of our needs. I would recommend this TV as a nice addition to any home.

Reviews.Title: Samsung lives up to its reputation
Reviews.Author: R. Fritzsche
Reviews.Content: When in doubt, buy Samsung. This is the latest of many Samsung products I have bought. Can't go wrong - the quality and reliability is outstanding. Good value at Amazon pricing.

Reviews.Title: TV Great Despite Poor Packaging
Reviews.Author: Connie
Reviews.Content: TV is fine with the exception of a small chip on the frame at the bottom.  You would have to be looking for it to see it. I was fearful that the tv would not be in good condition as it was packed very poorly....not to mention that I received the tv after the due date.End of the day.....TV is great. Samsung is a great brand. Seller (not Amazon)was horrible.

Reviews.Title: 37 inch Samsung HDTV LN37C550
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: This set works perfect. It fits our entertainment center. The only thing I would change is the speed when you turn it on. I sometimes push the remote again thinking it is not on. I think it will be fine when I get use to it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent picture & service
Reviews.Author: DJ "Gramma"
Reviews.Content: We received this TV 2 days after we ordered it.  Hooked it all up and then noticed a red line down the front of the pictured.  Called Samsung who told us it was defective so contacted Amazon. They emailed a return slip and UPS picked it up the next morning.  The following morning the new TV arrived!  This was Super Bowl week and we were blown away with the quick service.  Love the TV.  The picture is sharp and is everything we knew we'd get from Samsung....and Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great, except for buzz
Reviews.Author: ocean enthusiast
Reviews.Content: Irritating high pitch electronic buzz/whine from the back of the set.  Audible when set is turned down to moderate volume or muted.  I would be wary of purchasing this model, as it seems to be a common complaint about this TV out of the box.  I had to send the TV back, it wasn't going to work in the bedroom due to this.  I chose to not get a replacement, as I'm not confident a replacement wouldn't also have the same problem.  It is a shame because I was happy with everything else about the TV: nice picture, decent sound, very nice build quality, headphone out jack.

Reviews.Title: 37 Inch Samsung HDTV
Reviews.Author: J.C.
Reviews.Content: I actually had a problem with the first set I got, but Amazon imediately took care of the situation...I love the picture quality and it fits percectly in the space I chose....My only problem is I wish I could figure out a way to use only one remote control device, but over all I think I am going to really like this product....Thanks...J.C.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: William Guy
Reviews.Content: This is the 3rd Samsung I've bought.  This one for my inlaws, a 26 inch for the camper. and a 52 inch for the home along with a samsung Blu-ray player.  All are excellent TVs. I've had the oldest one over 2 years and never a moment's trouble.

Reviews.Title: Samsuck Can Care Less
Reviews.Author: TheSicilian "The Sicilian"
Reviews.Content: I purchased an entire samsuck entertainment system and I have 3 tvs from them. This one, like my prior one has to be replaced due to the loud buzzing. Its really weak service when these service people that come out usually do not have a clue. Amazon is SO GREAT about everything, that I would NEVER buy online without having them involved if at all possible. BUT samsuck on the other hand has the Absolute WORST customer service of any well know company I have ever had to endure. Besides the Tv issues, I had the BlueRay player that cost $400 that they had in their so-called service center back and forth 10 times, half the time they didnt even do a thing to it they just sent it back ( As admitted by the gibronie I got on the phone for THOSE conversations), and when they DID do "service" on it, it only got WORSE every time, until it started coming back with physical damage to it. I have tried to contact management, and they now do not respond to me at all. I am left with a beat up/damaged $400 worthless blueray player and a loud buzzing tv. The previous tv with the same buzz was a 37" 720P model. I am amazed how samsuck is still in business after all the thousands of serious customer service ( Or LACK of) that I have read about on-line. They have many products with fatal flaws that they just ignore until the customer gets exhausted and gives up, so it seems. Then these same ADHD sufferers go out and but another samsuck product?! Hello McFly!? What needs to be done is a huge class action lawsuit to put them back in perspective of proper respect for us the consumers who for some unknown reason to me, are keeping them as one of the few companies actually gaining in this economy. I will NEVER spend money on anything samsuck ever again, that is my guarantee, no matter what the reviews are, their customer service will jerk you around and screw you over in the end, and THAT my friends is NOT acceptable treatment of American consumers AT ALL, but they are getting away with it!

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN37C550 37-Inch 1080p 60 Hz LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: R. Gail Dunworth
Reviews.Content: Magnificent picture quality.  Remote is easy to use.  Instructions to setup were clear.  Very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Arrived Damaged - Inconvenient to Return It
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Ivers
Reviews.Content: I like the tv - very attractive.  However, it arrived with a crack in the "frame" that surrounds the screen.  So I had to repack it, call Amazon and sit at home until UPS came to pick it up.  Of course, UPS refused to provide any pick up time parameters - a real inconvenience.  When UPS arrived, they forgot to bring the label to affix to the box.  I had to have them fill out a "makeshift" receipt and just hope it gets back to Amazon.  I will think twice in the future before ordering such a large and relatively fragile item for delivery.  A real pain in the a__ to return it.

Reviews.Title: This is good but has a problem..
Reviews.Author: Karina C. Oscata "Karina "Thanks God""
Reviews.Content: This tv looks good but has a problem that the buttons to put up and down the volume and to change channels that are located in front of the TV are not very well because this does not catch light to get a better view...
